
\providecommand{\norm}{}
\renewcommand{\norm}[1]{\left\|#1\right\|}
\providecommand{\abs}{}
\renewcommand{\abs}[1]{\left|\strut #1\right|}
\providecommand{\ip}{}
\renewcommand{\ip}[2]{\langle#1,#2\rangle}
\providecommand{\set}{}
\renewcommand{\set}[2]{\left\{#1 \ \left|\ \strut #2\right.\right\}}
\providecommand{\prob}{}
\renewcommand{\prob}[1]{\text{Pr}\left(\ #1 \right)}
\providecommand{\condprob}{}
\renewcommand{\condprob}[2]{\text{Pr}\left(\ #1 \ \mid\ #2\ \right)}
\providecommand{\Span}{}
\renewcommand{\Span}{{\mbox{span}}}

\providecommand{\Poly}{}
\renewcommand{\Poly}{{\mathbf P}}
\providecommand{\Cont}{}
\renewcommand{\Cont}{{\mathbf C}}
\providecommand{\Reals}{}
\renewcommand{\Reals}{{\mathbb R}}
\providecommand{\Comp}{}
\renewcommand{\Comp}{{\mathbb C}}
\providecommand{\Nats}{}
\renewcommand{\Nats}{{\mathbb N}}
\providecommand{\Rats}{}
\renewcommand{\Rats}{{\mathbb Q}}
\providecommand{\Ints}{}
\renewcommand{\Ints}{{\mathbb Z}}
\providecommand{\Lap}{}
\renewcommand{\Lap}[1]{{\mathcal L}\left\{#1\right\}}
\providecommand{\Linv}{}
\renewcommand{\Linv}[1]{{\mathcal L}^{-1}\left\{#1\right\}}
\providecommand{\binary}{}
\renewcommand{\binary}[2]{#1\textrm{\tiny x}2^{#2}}

\providecommand{\Ro}{}
\renewcommand{\Ro}{\mathcal{R}_0}
